biotools.summary: PaSGAL (Parallel Sequence to Graph Aligner) is designed to accelerate local sequence alignment of sequences to directed acyclic sequence graphs (DAGs), e.g., variation graphs, splicing graphs.

bioschemas.name: PaSGAL
